name: Sea Monster Simulator 2018
description:
Live the life of the largest sea Monster in Sea Dragon Simulator 3D.
You have played many underwater games, fishing games, free Shark games but this is very different from other Sea animal simulation games. Dive into the deep sea as swim simulator to eat everything your way. In this sea monster games you have to face many challenges while playing, pass those challenges and earn coins to optimize your sea dragon as well as to reach next level. You are a giant attack beast with dragon break, having strong power & eating everything that comes towards your way. Attack boats, ships, deadly, scuba divers and jet skis to feed your appetite. So, are you ready to play and pass every challenge of this sea Monster dragon attack? Then download this new sea dragon game and enjoy under water games 2018.
Play as dangerous predator of the ocean in this Sea Dragon game. This Water monster smells sea animals and humans! Hunt down angry sharks, whales, dolphins and crabs. Hunt swimmers and hunters in marine life and enjoy beautiful sea life of a sea monster in this sea animal games. You are an ancient beast who can fight with hungry sharks, blue whales and other sea monsters for survival.
Sea Dragon simulator 2018 is thrilling game for all sea dragon game lover as well as water beasts fans. You can use your sea beast skills to survive in the deep water and beat your water rivals like killer sharks, dangerous beasts hunter as well as scuba divers by playing this sea dragon monster attack, game of 2018.
In this Sea Monster Games, the sea Dragon has arrived in Deep Ocean for destruction and rampage. Check your energy and a health indicator, if one of them drops, your chances to survive here would fell too. This new Dragon game gives you a chance to rage your anger in an easy way without making any Destruction in Deep Ocean. This Deadly dragon 3D enter into the animal rampage and hunt sea animals, as well as Deadly scuba Divers in this ocean simulator games. Being an ultimate dragon 3d warrior, you are the powerful beast and having strong hunting powers in Dragons’ kingdom. Feel the real thrill of Dragon attack and kill the sea animals, swimmer and feed your appetite.
Hungry Sea Dragon Simulator is interesting game with challenging water environment where you play as Sea Dragon like water dinosaur and survive in the water. Download Sea dragon simulator and start your adventures right now!
Game Features:
• Realistic underwater Experience
• Variety of missions with increasing difficulty.
• Different types of sea Dragon Skins
• Stunning HD Graphics
• Realistic sea dragon animations
• Smooth Controls and Easy gameplay
